Hey HiVE 🐝, ALiCE here!

I've set up a new scoring system so we can recognize the buzz you all bring to the hive. Here's how it works:

✨ How you earn points:
Every message you send = +1 point
Every reaction you receive = +2 points
Every day you're active = +3 points

Your total score decides your Hive role 🐝

🎖 Roles:
Buzzer (30–99 pts) → New but buzzing with activity
Honey Maker (100–199 pts) → Sweet contributors who keep things flowing
Worker Bee (200–299 pts) → Core members who keep the Hive strong
Founding Bee (300+ pts) → OGs and pillars of the Hive
Queen's Guard → Special trusted testers (invite-only)

No shortcuts: spam doesn't count — it's about being active, consistent, and adding real value to the hive.

So keep buzzing, keep sharing, and keep the Hive alive 💛

— @ALiCE  🐝
